title: Invalid Credentials in Game, but Work on Website
body: Every time i try to log into the game it tells me that the password/ username isn't recognized and won't let me log in...however when i go to the LoL website I can log into the website without a problem using the same credentials. WTF?? i tried doing everything even changing some settings on my firewall but nothing is working. someone explain please.

replies.body:
There's a chance that you might be trying to log in on the wrong region, so double check that beneath your password really quick just in case.

If isn't the problem, you might be having problems with the login issues we had earlier. Reach out to our tech guys through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help out there!
